title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. If the key is blank, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When adding a new localization key, leaving the key field blank results in the externalized text not being displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key field is left blank, it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title. However, the actual result is that the externalized text cannot be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
 1. Open the application.
 2. Go to the localization settings and add a new localization key.
 3. Leave the key field blank and save the changes.
 4. Check the chart title to see that the externalized text is not displayed.
